ControlDeveloper

Goal of the computer science lab III is to develop a program editor – the so called ControlDeveloper –, which enables to define and execute sequences of control commands in order to control a mobile vehicle.

See: Description

Package Description
hsrt.mec.controldeveloper.core.com  
hsrt.mec.controldeveloper.core.com.command  
hsrt.mec.controldeveloper.io  
hsrt.mec.controldeveloper.util  

Goal of the computer science lab III is to develop a program editor – the so called ControlDeveloper –, which enables to define and execute sequences of control commands in order to control a mobile vehicle. A possible solution for the graphical user interface (GUI) could have the following layout:

The architecture of the program editor consists out of the GUI-classes, the ControlDeveloperModel and classes for communication (I/O) and execution of defined command sequence. The architecture could have the following structure:
